title: Average
description: Billionaire alpha? Check.  Hung like a… well, you know. Check.  What more could a girl want? Or… what if that isn’t what she wants at all?  Sierra Baker literally crashes into billionaire, Rob Coldwell. She’s wined and dined and unimpressed. What she really wants is an average guy with an average… you know. Her childhood friend seems to fit the bill, but can she get past the yick factor and give him a chance?  Standalone. May turn into a series of standalones. HEA, of course. Not recommended for readers under 18 years of age due to sexual content and language. This is a novella, not a novel. It is approximately 21,000 words, 87 pages, and is a quick read at 90 minutes.
author: Quinn  Clarke
